comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 1.x branch in revision 791780.

description:
o.a.j.c.state.NodeStateMerger calls ChildNodeEntries.equals(ChildNodeEntries) to compare two child node entries collections.
ChildNodeEntries however doesn't override the equals(Object) method.
summary: o.a.j.core.state.ChildNodeEntries does not override equals(Object) and hashCode() methods
